definition: rock cave/grotto/cliff caves (often with Buddhist statues)
Longmen Grottoes at Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳[Luo4 yang2], Henan
Mogao caves in Dunhuang 敦煌, Gansu
Angkor Wat, temple complex in Cambodia
lit. nest of devils/place occupied by sinister forces
Yungang Caves at Datong 大同, Shanxi 山西
Dunhuang caves in Gansu/refers to Mogao caves 莫高石窟[Mo4 gao1 shi2 ku1]
lit. a crafty rabbit has three burrows/a sly individual has more than one plan to fall back on (idiom)

the four great caves, namely: Longmen Grottoes 龍門石窟|龙门石窟[Long2 men2 Shi2 ku1] at Luoyang, Henan, Yungang Caves 雲岡石窟|云冈石窟[Yun2 gang1 Shi2 ku1] at Datong, Shanxi, Mogao Caves 莫高窟[Mo4 gao1 ku1] at Dunhuang, Gansu, and Mt Maiji Caves 麥積山石窟|麦积山石窟[Mai4 ji1 Shan1 Shi2 ku1] at Tianshui, Gansu
money squandering establishment (e.g. gambling den, brothel etc)

sentences.english: Danapati Bodhisattva, Tang dynasty, cave fresco, cave 401, Mogao grottoes, Dunhuang.
sentences.chinese: 供養菩薩，唐，石窟壁畫，敦煌莫高窟第401窟。

sentences.english: This time, without a shark cage.
sentences.chinese: 而且這一次，沒有鯊魚窟。

sentences.english: Fengxian Temple is the biggest cave in Longmen Grottoes, which is 30-meter in length and width.
sentences.chinese: 奉先寺是龍門石窟中最大的一個窟，長寬各30餘米。

sentences.english: Some of the colors in the grottos are still original and vivid.
sentences.chinese: 窟內的一些顏色仍舊保持原樣，栩栩如生。

sentences.english: Memories of happier days were enshrined in the old man's heart.
sentences.chinese: 對與幸福時光的回憶銘窟麏窒人的心中。

sentences.english: But Nyad plans to swim without protection from a shark cage.
sentences.chinese: 但是納艾德卻計劃不帶任何防護裝備穿越鯊魚窟。

sentences.english: The wood was so rotten you could put your finger through it.
sentences.chinese: 木頭已經朽了，用手指一掐就是一個窟巄。

sentences.english: Liars of terrible devotion, caverns of virgins, ferocious places.
sentences.chinese: 殘忍的苦行窟，處女們的火坑，蠻不講理的地方。

sentences.english: Chic flash abidjan has become the siren of west africa.
sentences.chinese: 時髦奢華的阿比讓已成爲西非紙醉金迷的迷魂窟。

definition: rock cave/grotto/cliff caves (often with Buddhist statues)
underground palace (as part of imperial tomb)
senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel
lit. nest of devils/place occupied by sinister forces
